TopicTitle: North Kerbin Weaponry Tsar bomba, Castle bravo, and other nuclear bombs wont work

Articles.Content: My North kerbin weaponry mods nuclear bombs have stopped working. It is only the bombs as nuclear rounds and rockets still work. I have tried deleting .dll's, re installing BD armory/NKW and installing different versions of each, as well as verifying KSP's cache, I would love to know if anyone can help with the bombs, as its really pitiful to see a tsar bomba hit the ground and spit out a tiny explosion that does nothing.

did you click "fire missile", or put it on a Decoupler?

is you did the latter, then thats why its so puny of an explosion

On 11/26/2017 at 3:24 PM, ApertureCreatorcCEO said:

My North kerbin weaponry mods nuclear bombs have stopped working. It is only the bombs as nuclear rounds and rockets still work. I have tried deleting .dll's, re installing BD armory/NKW and installing different versions of each, as well as verifying KSP's cache, I would love to know if anyone can help with the bombs, as its really pitiful to see a tsar bomba hit the ground and spit out a tiny explosion that does nothing.
